item.title: The beginning of Smart Home
item.description:
This is something that, if it had to be traced, would have come from a middle school love of Iron Man.

I wanna have the same Jarvis.

The prototype of Jarvis

The solution is STC8051+LD3320.

The solution’s judgment is based on Chinese pinyin, and the recognition is very inaccurate, but it satisfies the needs of junior high school me who didn’t want to get out of bed and turn off the light on winter nights.

To make the system look less thin and boring, I added a Bluetooth audio system

Home Assistant

The second generation is based on Homeassistant, a python-based hub system.

In the meantime, I moved to a new home. The garage holds a whole rack of servers.

In this server I ran the routing system and the smart home system. I then developed the voice input and output modules for the new system as well.

To be continued…
